response.job_title: Public relations, communications and event consultant for startups, tech, finance and venture capital.
response.summary:
Communications professional with +9 years of experience in public relations, events, networking and outreach strategies for +40 companies, entities and startups in LATAM, US and Spain such as Deel, Latitud, Yuno, Blackrock, Newtopia VC, Minka, MinTIC, Revelo, Suricata Labs, Usaria, MET Community, FITS by IED, Nubank and many more.

Passionate about education, entrepreneurship and empowerment. Blogger, columnist and social entrepreneur.
response.skills: Advertising, Event Planning, Corporate Communications, English, Public Relations, Journalism, Newsletters, Writing, Social Media Marketing, Photography, Microsoft Office, Strike

profile_positions.title: Community Builder and Business Connector - Co-founder

profile_positions.description:
Public Relations, events and Comms firm specialized in startups, tech and venture capital.

We offer free press, communications, virtual, immersive/Metaverse and on-site events, influencers, public affairs, networking and marketing consultancy for Colombian and international companies, startups and venture capital in LATAM, US and Spain.

Some clients: DEEL, Yuno, Minka, Blackrock, Latitud, Mono, Celes, Universidad EAN, Newtopia VC, Refácil, Revelo, Zubale, Apparta, Cámara Comercio Bogotá, Lizit, Fits by IED, Usaria, Evok, Dislicores, La Solar Festival and many more.

www.lenspr.com

profile_positions.description:
- Coordinate and lead communications for APPS.CO, the digital entrepreneurship program from MINTIC with +51k beneficiaries in Colombia only in 2020. (www.apps.co)
- Coordinate and lead the communications teams of 10+ national wide program operators with +900 beneficiaries. 
- Coordinate and lead communications, media, and press strategies of INSPIRATIC, a +400k assistants virtual entrepreneurship event. (www.inspiratic.gov.co)
- Coordinate the launching of Nubank in Colombia with David Velez Nubank CEO, Ivan Duque President of Colombia and the ICT Ministry Karen Abudinen at the Movistar Arena in Bogotá.

www.mintic.gov.co

company.name: (Fun)raising Fellowship
company.industry: Venture Capital and Private Equity Principals
company.description:
Levantar capital es una experiencia intensa y solitaria:  

En los últimos 7 años hemos trabajado con todo tipo de founders  ayudándoles a estructurar y gestionar de forma exitosa sus rondas de inversión con enfoque global.

Ahora queremos volcar toda nuestra experiencia para ayudar a los founders a lograr sus objetivos. Por eso creamos la primera comunidad de founders, mentores, e inversionistas para dar ese acompañamiento que es tan necesario.

---

(Fun)raising is a paid, private, and invitation-only community for founders, CEOs, entrepreneurs, advisors, and investors who speak Spanish and understand the rules of the game in Latin America.

location.raw: New York, New York, United States
